SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwICAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Layman	    0 CultReputation,	Personality 30, Willpower 30
; 1 = Novice		    5 CultReputation,	Personality 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Initiate		  10 CultReputation,	Personality 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Acolyte		  20 CultReputation,	Personality 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Adept		  30 CultReputation,	Personality 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Disciple	  45 CultReputation,	Personality 31, Willpower 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Oracle		  60 CultReputation,	Personality 32, Willpower 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Invoker	  80 CultReputation,	Personality 33, Willpower 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Theurgist	100 CultReputation,	Personality 34, Willpower 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Primate	125 CultReputation,	Personality 35, Willpower 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Cult = Blunt, Conjuration, HandToHand, Mysticism, Restoration, Speechcraft

SHORT CultAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT CultReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce



BEGIN GameMode

	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ImperialSCult == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ImperialSCult
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0ImperialSCult
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ImperialSCult)
				SetPCExpelled 0ImperialSCult 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Imperial Cult."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0ImperialSCult 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0ImperialSCult
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ImperialSCult)
				SetPCExpelled 0ImperialSCult 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Imperial Cult."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0ImperialSCult 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF CultAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 91
			SET CultAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET CultAdvancement TO 0
		RETURN
	ENDIF ; CultAdvancement == 4

	IF CultAdvancement == 3 || CultAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 0
		IF CultReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 10 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 10 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 10
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 1
		IF CultReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 20 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 20 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 20
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 2
		IF CultReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 30 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 30 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 30
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 3
		IF CultReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 40 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 40 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 40
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 4
		IF CultReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 31 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 50 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 50 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 50
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 5
		IF CultReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 32 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 60 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 60 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 60
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 6
		IF CultReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 33 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 70 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 70 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 70
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 7
		IF CultReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 34 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 80 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 80 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 80
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwICAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSCult == 8
		IF CultReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 35 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 90 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 90 || Player.GetAV HandToHand >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwICAdvancement 90
			SET CultAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET CultAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET CultAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET CultAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2088 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

SLSD - Local Variable Data.Unused: CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
